author: Victoria Friedman, Victoria Friedman
title: Coronavirus: Lockdown Working, Hospital Admissions Slowing, Say UK Scientists
description: There are early signs that social distancing measures are "making a difference" and that the increase of new patients being admitted to hospital with coronavirus is slowing, according to chief scientific adviser Sir Patrick Vallance.
content:
There are early signs that social distancing measures are “making a difference” and that the increase of new patients being admitted to hospital with coronavirus is slowing, according to chief scientific adviser Sir Patrick Vallance.
